data.prayer: Spirit, train the church of Tizi Ouzou, Algeria to trust with all their hearts, and you will make their paths straight.
data.verse: Trust in Yahweh with all your heart, and don’t lean on your own understanding. In all your ways acknowledge him, and he will make your paths straight.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Tizi Ouzou, Algeria
data.section_summary: What challenges do people here face?

data.prayer: Jesus, please bless the leaders of the the state of Tizi Ouzou, Algeria who work hard at shepherding and guiding your people.
data.verse: With upright heart he shepherded them and guided them with his skillful hand.

data.prayer: Father, let love abound more and more in the church of Tizi Ouzou, Algeria.
data.verse: And this is my prayer: that your love may abound more and more in knowledge and depth of insight

data.prayer: Father, be a refuge and strength for the hurting in Tizi Ouzou, Algeria today.
data.verse: God is our refuge and strength, an ever-present help in trouble.

data.prayer: Lord, Let your Kingdom come among the Berber, Menasser people. Let your will be done, as in heaven, so on earth.
Father, please send new teachers into the harvest, who can correct the lies of our enemy in the state of Tizi Ouzou, Algeria.
data.verse: Ask the Lord of the harvest, therefore, to send out workers into his harvest field.

data.prayer: Jesus, help the local leaders in Tizi Ouzou, Algeria to be faithful with what they have been given, whether a little or a lot.
data.verse: Everyone to whom much was given, of him much will be required, and from him to whom they entrusted much, they will demand the more.

data.section_summary:
the state of Tizi Ouzou, Algeria has a population of 1,127,600.

We estimate Tizi Ouzou has 769 people who might know Jesus, 93 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 1,126,738 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 1,466 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Father, it’s possible most of the 1,126,738 lost people in  Tizi Ouzou, Algeria have never held or opened a Bible. Please change this, Father.
data.verse: Yet faith comes from listening to this Good News—the Good News about Christ.
